Title: Redrum
Plot: A prominent lawyer wakes to find himself in jail and about to be prosecuted for the murder of his wife. He has no memory of this event however, and when the days begin to regress backward towards the murder, he realizes that he has been given a second chance.
GuestStars: Joe Morton, Bellamy Young, Guy Torry, Joanna Sanchez, J. Patrick McCormack, Jack Shearer, Lee Duncan, Cynthia Martells, Danny Trejo, Shane Sinutko, James Howell, Brien Blakely, Derick Alexander, Luis Rodriguez, Kay
